Laboratory > > Crypt of the Violent Ogre > Area # 1

Foreshadowing
  • When listening from outside, footsteps can be faintly heard from inside this area.
Doorways
  • S side - rectangular wooden door (Stuck)
  • E side - rectangular marble door (Barricaded)
Description
Four or five cauldrons were placed on top of stone-made blocks and the ground has a few rusty stains on it. You see glowing eyes staring at you from inside.
  • There’s a Grimlock inside, looking through some rubble. It will attack anyone stepping in.

Arntrude of Ashamar.raw_value:
Hex S29 in Grey Mist Snowlands (The Lands of Vo'il)

Trapped Bard > > The Lands of Vo'il > Grey Mist Snowlands > Hex S29

A frozen waterfall is the only way to march south-east from here and will require climbing or rappelling to cross it.

Music drifts between two snowy giant boulders. A warm, honeyed melody inviting you to listen a while. Following the music to its source you find Arntrude, a terrified bard surrounded by sleeping monsters (from the random encounters table). She stares at you in desperation, trapped by her own lullaby and unable to escape.

Arntrude of Ashamar. She has soft voice, wild green eyes and a double chin (Guilty). In the pocket: a dirty handkerchief.

Thugs.raw_value:
Hex E4S44 in Goldenswan Timberlands (The Lands of Vo'il)

Bridge > > The Lands of Vo'il > Goldenswan Timberlands > Hex E4S44

So big and tall are the trees here. Their tops are almost hidden by the dense mist. Their trunks are as wide as a hut. Some of them have planks of wood attached, forming a ladder.

There’s a half-broken stone bridge where the woods meet a large hill.

  • The bridge is guarded by murderous Thugs
    CR: 1/2 (100 XP)
    AC: 11 (leather armor)
    HP: (5d8 + 10)
    Speed: Walk 30 ft.
    STRDEXCONINTWISCHA
    15 +3 11 +1 14 +2 10 10 11 +1
    • Alignment: Lawful Neutral Chaotic Neutral Evil
    • Languages: any one language (usually Common)
    • Pack Tactics: The thug has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the thug's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't incapacitated.
    Actions
    • Multiattack: The thug makes two melee attacks.
    • Mace: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Inflicts 5 (1d6 + 2) bludgeoning damage.
    • Heavy Crossbow: +2 to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. Inflicts 5 (1d10) piercing damage.

    • Lair hoard (if found through tracking, deception or any other reasonable way):
      • 180 gp in coins
      • 400 gp worth of gemstones (50gp each): Bloodstone, Carnelian, 2 × Moonstone, 2 × Zircon, Citrine, Quartz
      • Magic Items: Nolzur's marvelous pigments

2 Trolls.raw_value:
Hex S12 in Goldseeker's Cliffs (The Lands of Vo'il)

Trolls > > The Lands of Vo'il > Goldseeker's Cliffs > Hex S12

The passages here are surrounded with steep vertical cliffs and are branching to all directions like a fractured maze.

2 Trolls are foraging near the base of the tallest mountain.

There’s a 2-in-6 chance of encountering at least some of them outside, trying to start a fire (the rest will be in their lair inside an old abandoned copper mine).

Troll

CR: 5 (1800 XP)
AC: 15 (natural armor)
HP: (8d10 + 40)
Speed: Walk 30 ft.
STRDEXCONINTWISCHA
18 +4 13 +2 20 +5 7 -2 9 -1 7 -2
  • Senses: darkvision 60 ft.
  • Alignment: Chaotic Evil
  • Languages: Giant
  • Keen Smell: The troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.
  • Regeneration: The troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn. If the troll takes acid or fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
Actions
  • Multiattack: The troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.
  • Bite: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
  • Claw: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
  • Lair hoard (1-in-6 base chance of finding if an encounter occured, or a succesfull DC18 Investigation check):
    • 4,209 gp in coins
    • 1,300 gp worth of gemstones (100gp each): Coral, 2 × jet, 2 × Pearl, 2 × Tourmaline, 2 × Spinel, 2 × Amber, 2 × Chrysoberyl
    • Magic Items: Dust of sneezing and choking, 2 × Potion of fire breath, Potion of greater healing

2 Giant Apes.raw_value:
Hex E1S34 in Iceborn Wilderness (The Lands of Vo'il)

Giant Apes > > The Lands of Vo'il > Iceborn Wilderness > Hex E1S34

A small pond sits between the jungle trees here. At night, countless mysterious forms glow an eerie purple light deep in the water.

2 Giant Apes are sleeping near a water stream.

There’s a 2-in-6 chance of encountering at least some of them outside (the rest will be in their lair inside an old forgotten gold mine).

Grick.raw_value:
Cave area #38 in Lair of the Mourning Hopes

Cave Hall > > Lair of the Mourning Hopes > Area # 38

Foreshadowing
  • You hear echoing droplets of water.
Description
The flowstone on the ground shimmers through the darkness and the stalactites are carved with claw marks. You feel as if you're being watched.
  • There are 3 Gricks inside. They will attack anyone stepping in.

    Grick

    CR: 2 (450 XP)
    AC: 14 (natural armor)
    HP: (6d8)
    Speed: Walk 30 ft. Climb 30 ft.
    STRDEXCONINTWISCHA
    14 +2 14 +2 11 +1 3 -4 14 +2 5 -3

      • Magic Items: Nolzur's marvelous pigments, 2 × Potion of longevity, Potion of speed

  • Several large decorative pillows can be found in the far corner.

  • Swallow: The toad makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has TAG:quickref against attacks and other effects outside the toad, and it takes 10 (3d6) acid damage at the start of each of the toad's turns. The toad can have only one target swallowed at a time., If the toad dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Dense fog covers the wet ground here. It is difficult to tell what lies ahead or what lurks under your feet.

A dizzyingly complex maze sprawls on a dry patch of land. The labyrinthine paths weaving unfathomable patterns through the puzzle. A desperate cry erupts from within, the voice begging for help with primal urgency.

ghostly pendulum.raw_value:
Hex W4S38 in Moonwatcher Wetlands (The Lands of Vo'il)

Spectral Pendulum > > The Lands of Vo'il > Moonwatcher Wetlands > Hex W4S38

Dense fog covers the wet ground here. It is difficult to tell what lies ahead or what lurks under your feet.

The spectral form of a towering, ghostly pendulum swings with a vicious rhythm beside a stream of water. Beneath the deadly apparition the fresh corpse of a Will-o'-Wisp lies in two, bisected by the umbral blade.

Random encounter

There's a 1 in 6 chance when exploring (or 2 in 6 chance if camping overnight) to be ambushed or preyed upon by:

1d4 Encounter Stats

Actions
  • Bite: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Inflicts 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage, and the target is grappled (escape DC11). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the frog can't bite another target.
  • Swallow: The frog makes one bite attack against a Small or smaller target it is grappling. If the attack hits, the target is swallowed, and the grapple ends. The swallowed target is blinded and restrained, it has TAG:quickref against attacks and other effects outside the frog, and it takes 5 (2d4) acid damage at the start of each of the frog's turns. The frog can have only one target swallowed at a time. If the frog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer restrained by it and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting prone.

Hex W1S22 in Thunderwave Woodlands (The Lands of Vo'il)

Veterans > > The Lands of Vo'il > Thunderwave Woodlands > Hex W1S22

Dense ivy and vegetation cover an old skeleton of a dragon, as if sleeping peacefully in a clearing surrounded by the trees.

2 Veterans are foraging next to a clearing.

There’s a 2-in-6 chance of encountering at least some of them outside (the rest will be in their lair inside the ruins of an abandoned stronghold).

CR: 3 (700 XP)
AC: 17 (splint armor)
HP: (9d8 + 18)
Speed: Walk 30 ft.
